# Git
.git
.gitignore

# Virtual environments
**/venv
**/.env
**/*.env

# Dependency directories
**/node_modules
**/dist
**/build

# Python cache files
**/__pycache__
**/*.pyc
**/*.pyo
**/*.pyd

# Logs
**/*.log

# Editor directories
.vscode
.idea
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Test files
**/tests
**/test

# Backup files
**/*.bak
